title: What is CS0163?
labels: All compiler errors have to be fixed

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I am getting the error below appearing in my console:
error CS0163: Control cannot fall through from one case label to another

sections.title: Cause
content: CS0163 is caused when a switch with more than one case is not explicitly terminated within each section. This is required as a switch does not allow multiple cases to be used in the same iteration of the switch.

sections.title: Resolution
content: CS0163 is fixed by adding either of the following statements to each case.
